Motormaster transformed and shifted into his robot mode. He then 
looked down at Symphony. "You want to be a Decepticon? Then act like 
one" he spat harshly. He grabbed him by the arm and easily hoisted him 
up, and began to fly towards the next continent, trying to catch up to 
the others.
